text: melum, israyilin cantatiyinarai nam katalaik katakka vaittom; appotu, hpir'avnum, avanutaiya pataikalum, (alavu katantu) kotumaiyum, pakaimaiyum kontu avarkalaip pin totarntarkal; (avanai mulkatikka ventiya neram nerunki) avan mulka arampittatum avan; israyilin cantatiyinar enta nayan mitu iman kontullarkalo, avanait tavira veru iraivan illaiyenru nanum iman kolkiren; innum nan avanukke murrum valipatupavarkalil (muslimkalil) oruvanaka irukkinren" enru kurinan
